Reviews.Title: GREAT LITTLE PHONE
Reviews.Author: Delores E. Tuxon "D Tuxon"
Reviews.Content: It's exactly what was needed. Bigger screen and numbers and loud enough ringtones. Good for a person who does not see all that good. Easy enough to program when I got the hang of it. Good buy

Reviews.Title: Not as bullet proof as my last
Reviews.Author: Ricky Willems "RDW"
Reviews.Content: Its a solid little phone. Battery life is excellent, button feel is good, screen is easy to read.I am a little disappointed in two ways, in comparison to the Sanyo Taho I had before this phone. Firstly, this phone (or at least the one I received) is not fully waterproof. After using it in the rain, I had some condensation form behind the screen, which took about a week to disappear. Secondly, this phone doesn't feel quite as durable, specifically the flipping hinge. It doesn't feel as solid as Id like. It would also be nice if it had a camera.

Reviews.Title: Sprint Kyocera
Reviews.Author: james simmons
Reviews.Content: We wanted a simple phone without all the smartphone decorations, and what we got was what we asked for. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Jose diaz
Reviews.Content: It's simple to use and perfect for rugged work.  Great features.  Only drawback is no camera and does not receive pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: desiree
Reviews.Content: Thrilled to find such a low cost phone in perfect condition! No complaints here. This is a perfectly simple phone, easy to operate and completely durable!

Reviews.Title: Rugged
Reviews.Author: Tyler Ken Smith
Reviews.Content: Nice sturdy phone, It takes some time to get used to the operating system but the person i gave it to loves it.

Reviews.Title: Durable basic phone
Reviews.Author: Michael Layton
Reviews.Content: I had to purchase this phone when my LG F3 died after six months and LG refused to replace it. I mostly use a samsung tablet so did not need to spend $600 on a sprint compatible smart phone. So I got this phone call clarity is great, it was super easy to active on my sprint account and works great. battery life seems excellent but lets face it all I can really do is talk on it. Texting and web stuff is impossible with my large fingers and the small keys.If you need a second phone just to call on and want something that will stand up to abuse this would be a good canidate. The few features it has work simply and as I stated up Battery life and call clarity are good.

Reviews.Title: Exact replacement
Reviews.Author: mechanic
Reviews.Content: Needed to replace my smart phone to a basic simple phone just for calling.  Good price and worked perfect.  Now I am pleased with the phone along with the inexpensive plan.
